article_title: Here's Why Healthcare Is So Expensive, According To Your Favorite Presidential Candidate

article_metadata.description: The United States far outspends peer countries on healthcare. When American politicians complain about these high healthcare costs, they often vilify pharmaceutical and insurance companies for profiting at the expense of the general public.
